mapper.insert: insert into member(name, id, pw, semester, dept, toeic) values (#{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{semester}, #{dept}, 'X')
mapper.update: update member set semester = #{semester}, toeic = #{toeic} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sum(credits) from user_class where id = #{id}
select (common + must_major + sel_major + basic + english) as total from dept_info where years = #{years} and dept = #{dept}
mapper.insert: insert into user_class(id, dept, field, className, credits, english, semester) values (#{id}, #{dept}, #{field}, #{className}, #{credits}, #{english}, #{semester})
mapper.select: select * from dept_info where dept = #{dept} and years = #{years}
select field, className, credits, english, years from class_table where years = (select years from member where id = #{id})
select field, sum(credits) as credits, id from user_class where id = #{id} group by field
select field, sum(credits) as credits from user_class where semester = #{semester} and dept = #{dept} group by field
select count(id) from user_class where semester = #{semester} and dept = #{dept}
